channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【How we found a bug in Go's arm64 compiler】我们如何发现 Go 的 arm64 编译器中的错误
item.description: 【 84 million requests a second means even rare bugs appear often. We'll reveal how we discovered a race condition in the Go arm64 compiler and got it fixed. 】每秒 8400 万个请求意味着即使罕见的错误也经常出现。我们将揭示如何在 Go arm64 编译器中发现竞争条件并修复它。

item.title: 【Payload on Workers: a full-fledged CMS, running entirely on Cloudflare’s stack】Workers 上的有效负载：成熟的 CMS，完全在 Cloudflare 堆栈上运行
item.description: 【 We demonstrate how the open-source Payload CMS was ported to run entirely on Cloudflare's developer platform. 】我们演示了如何将开源 Payload CMS 移植到完全在 Cloudflare 的开发者平台上运行。

item.title: 【Nationwide Internet shutdown in Afghanistan extends localized disruptions】阿富汗全国互联网关闭扩大了局部中断
item.description: 【 On September 29, 2025, Internet connectivity was completely shut down across Afghanistan, impacting business, education, finance, and government services. 】2025 年 9 月 29 日，阿富汗各地的互联网连接完全关闭，影响了商业、教育、金融和政府服务。

item.title: 【15 years of helping build a better Internet: a look back at Birthday Week 2025】15 年来帮助建设更好的互联网：回顾 2025 年生日周
item.description: 【 Rust-powered core systems, post-quantum upgrades, developer access for students, PlanetScale integration, open-source partnerships, and our biggest internship program ever — 1,111 interns in 2026. 】Rust 支持的核心系统、后量子升级、学生开发人员访问权限、PlanetScale 集成、开源合作伙伴关系以及我们有史以来最大的实习计划 - 2026 年将有 1,111 名实习生。

item.title: 【Cloudflare just got faster and more secure, powered by Rust】由 Rust 提供支持的 Cloudflare 变得更快、更安全
item.description: 【 We’ve replaced the original core system in Cloudflare with a new modular Rust-based proxy, replacing NGINX. 】我们用基于 Rust 的新模块化代理取代了 Cloudflare 中的原始核心系统，取代了 NGINX。

item.title: 【Monitoring AS-SETs and why they matter】监控 AS-SET 及其重要性
item.description: 【 We will cover some of the reasons why operators need to monitor the AS-SET memberships for their ASN, and now Cloudflare Radar can help. 】我们将介绍运营商需要监控其 ASN 的 AS-SET 成员资格的一些原因，现在 Cloudflare Radar 可以提供帮助。

item.title: 【An AI Index for all our customers】适合我们所有客户的人工智能指数
item.description: 【 Cloudflare will soon automatically create an AI-optimized search index for your domain, and expose a set of ready-to-use standard APIs and tools including an MCP server, LLMs.txt, and a search API. 】Cloudflare 很快就会自动为您的域创建 AI 优化的搜索索引，并公开一组即用型标准 API 和工具，包括 MCP 服务器、LLMs.txt 和搜索 API。

item.title: 【Introducing Observatory and Smart Shield — see how the world sees your website, and make it faster in one click】推出 Observatory 和 Smart Shield — 了解世界如何看待您的网站，一键使其速度更快
item.description: 【 We're announcing two enhancements to our Application Performance suite that'll show how the world sees your website, and make it faster with one click - available Cloudflare Dashboard! 】我们宣布对我们的应用程序性能套件进行两项增强，将向全世界展示您的网站，并一键使其速度更快 - 可用的 Cloudflare 仪表板！

item.title: 【Code Mode: the better way to use MCP】代码模式：更好的使用MCP的方式
item.description: 【 It turns out we've all been using MCP wrong. Most agents today use MCP by exposing the "tools" directly to the LLM. 】事实证明我们都错误地使用了 MCP。如今，大多数代理人通过直接向 LLM 公开“工具”来使用 MCP。

item.title: 【Introducing new regional Internet traffic and Certificate Transparency insights on Cloudflare Radar】在 Cloudflare Radar 上引入新的区域互联网流量和证书透明度见解
item.description: 【 Cloudflare Radar now offers a Certificate Transparency dashboard for monitoring TLS certificate activity, and new regional traffic insights for a sub-national perspective on Internet trends. 】Cloudflare Radar 现在提供用于监控 TLS 证书活动的证书透明度仪表板，以及用于从地方角度了解互联网趋势的新区域流量见解。
